Posts.EditableText: If I hi-light the "Default Font Size" on the Game Display tab, then erase it with my backspace key and try to run the game, I get the message "Run-type error '13': Type mismatch".
Posts.HTML: If I hi-light the "Default Font Size" on the Game Display tab, then erase it with my backspace key and try to run the game, I get the message "Run-type error '13': Type mismatch".

Posts.EditableText: Thanks for this, I have reproduced the problem and added it to my list of bugs to fix.
Posts.HTML: Thanks for this, I have reproduced the problem and added it to my list of bugs to fix.
